children.name: title
children.label: Title
children.default: We started building Skopenow in 2015 to help organizations make sense of internet-based data.

children.name: content
children.label: Content
children.default: Fusing our early product with human investigators to aggregate content from around the web, Skopenow had a vision to deliver a comprehensive investigations platform by combining public data with AI. As a Techstars company, we received investment from a number of VCs and high-profile angels, including Runway VP, Contour Ventures, Sinai VC, MS&AD, Forefront Ventures, Barbara Corcoran, and Colle Capital.

default.heading: Launch
